borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Removal of Condition 7 of the planning permission reference: 2022/00164/FUL granted 19th April 2023 for the 'Erection of a single storey rear extension to the side and rear of existing back addition; installation of bi-folding doors, in connection with the formation of a balcony to the rear elevation at second floor level; installation of a new window to replace existing window, to the rear elevation at ground floor level; formation of external stairs to the front elevation from ground to lower ground floor level; erection of 2no. bin stores to the front elevation at ground and lower ground floor level; erection of a cycle store to the rear elevation at ground floor level; erection of a cycle store underneath the stairs to the front elevation at lower ground floor level; excavation beneath the front garden to create a lightwell, in connection with the enlargement of the existing basement; conversion of the existing property from a single dwellinghouse into 2no. self-contained flats consisting of 1 x three bedroom maisonette and 1 x two bedroom maisonette.' To allow removal or changes to the wording of Condition 7 to allow the use of efficient gas boilers instead of ASHP and electric boiler.
